snippet: Pie baking can become a daily event in summer, but quarts of cherry, blueberry and peach fillings, ready at a moment’s notice, can make an easy dessert in deepest winter.
abstract: Pie baking can become a daily event in summer, but quarts of jarred cherry, blueberry and peach fillings, ready at a moment’s notice, can make an easy dessert in deepest winter.
lead_paragraph: Pie baking can become a daily event in summer, but quarts of cherry, blueberry and peach fillings, ready at a moment’s notice, can make an easy dessert in deepest winter.

headline.seo: Going Into Fall, Let Them Eat Pie
headline.main: Nothing Like a Slice of Birthday Pie
headline.print_headline: Nothing Like a Slice Of Birthday Pie
